instructions1: Welcome to the memory game! In this game, you must learn which images go together.
You will see two images on the left and right side of the screen, like this.
Your job is to remember that these images go together.
To help memory, you can link the images through a story. For example, jessica alba likes this old book.
After you see the images, we will test your memory.
Get ready to see the images! Each pair will only last on the screen for a few seconds, so pay attention.
We'll first do a practice to get you familiar with the game.
When you're ready to start the practice, press space!
